column4: NetWork manager / wlan0 Question: in my system-connections config file for my wlan0 I have in the [ipv4] section addresses1=192.168.1.102;24;192.168.1.1    ....     shouldn't it be 192.168.1.102;255.255.255.0;192.168.1.1??
i'm connected to router but have no interweb
the ;24; bit means /24 which is equivelant to 255.255.255.0
